DOC.brief_title: Emervel Deep Lidocaine vs. Juvederm® Ultra Plus Treatment Moderate Severe Facial Wrinkles Folds
DOC.detailed_description: ﻿This randomize , evaluator-blinded , active-controlled , multi-center , split-face comparison study Emervel Classic Lidocaine versus Juvederm® Ultra treatment moderate severe facial wrinkle fold . Two physician , Unblinded Injecting Investigator Blinded Evaluating Investigator , require study center . The Unblinded Injecting Investigator must different Blinded Evaluating Investigator .
